title: Ex-Phoenixville schools finance chief gets 14 months in prison for embezzling $94,000 - The Mercury
content: Ex-Phoenixville schools finance chief gets 14 months in prison for embezzling $94,000  The Mercury
description: “Criminals that embezzle public money from schools are ripping off hundreds of students while also ripping off all taxpayers who fund them,” said U.S. Attorney Jennifer Arbittier Williams.
